attributes.additional_details:
I ask that the Government will continue the electrification of northern railway lines after 2015. The lines that need to be done are:
1. Liverpool - Warrington - Manchester
2. Manchester/Guide Bridge - Huddersfield - Leeds - York
3. Manchester - Todmorden - Bradford - Leeds - Hull
4. Manchester - Sheffield - Hull/Grimsby

Plus any infil lines between these major routes to give flexability of services.
